title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Entity: Production & Operations Job Family Group: IT&S Group Job Description: Role Synopsis The Machine Learning Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining data science models in bpx’s machine learning studio. The role will be a subject matter expert in machine learning operations and the associated technology.
